content.text:
# King Kaly

| birth_place        = Uyo, Nigeria
| education          = University of Huddersfield
| occupation         = Online streamer, Content creator, Civil Engineer
| years_active       = 2024-Present
| tiktok_handle       = king_kaly

}}
Idongesit Etukudo Isemin (born 21 June 1996), professionally known as TikTok King or King Kaly, is a Nigerian philanthropist, online streamer and content creator. He gained prominence in 2025 for his live TikTok battles and currently holds the record for the most-viewed TikTok live battle by an African, after defeating previous record holder Peller. In 2025, he was awarded Best TikTok Battle Host by TikTok UK. In the  same year, he was featured by Wazobia FM and TVC Nigeria as one of the top emerging creatives.
Early life and education
King Kaly was born on 21 June 1996 in Uyo, Akwa Ibom State, Nigeria. He spent part of his childhood in Malaysia before relocating to the United Kingdom. He earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Civil Engineering from SEGi University in Malaysia, and later obtained a Master’s degree in Engineering Management from the University of Huddersfield in the United Kingdom.
Career
According to Racheal Ayodele of Daily Post Nigeria, Isemin’s formative years in Malaysia played a significant role in shaping his creative direction. He launched his TikTok career in March 2024 and quickly rose to prominence, becoming one of Nigeria’s fastest-growing creators to reach 1.9 million followers. His TikTok Box Battle series consistently topped TikTok Africa’s daily rankings. In 2025, his popularity peaked after defeating African streaming record-holder Peller in a high-profile TikTok Box Battle. That same year, he was named Best TikTok Battle Host by TikTok UK.
Philanthropy
King Kaly is known for his philanthropy through initiatives that has helped a lot of individuals & Businesses in Nigeria through fundraising for those in need and promoting local businesses. Vanguard Nigeria stated that Isemin utilizes his influence not only to entertain but also to raise awareness about pressing social issues, from poverty to access to education through his philanthropy.
